createCommands: mkdir mern-app && cd mern-app && npx create-react-app client && mkdir server && cd server && npm init -y && npm install express cors mongoose && printf "const express=require('express');const app=express();app.listen(5000);" > index.js
folderStructure:
mern-app/
├── client/
│   ├── public/
│   ├── src/
│   └── package.json
└── server/
    ├── index.js
    ├── models/
    ├── routes/
    └── package.json
quickstart:
1. Run the create command
2. Start MongoDB
3. Run server: cd server && node index.js
4. Run client: cd client && npm start

copyBlocks.create: mkdir mern-app && cd mern-app && npx create-react-app client && mkdir server && cd server && npm init -y && npm install express cors mongoose && printf "const express=require('express');const app=express();app.listen(5000);" > index.js
copyBlocks.run: cd mern-app/server && node index.js && cd ../client && npm start
